title: Did Hillary Clinton give 20% U.S. uranium to Russia for the Clinton Foundation's donations?
subtitle: The allegations of a "trading" deal granting Russia ownership of one fifth of the uranium deposits in the United States for $145 million in contributions to the Clinton Foundation are unfounded.
author: David Emery
vclaim: (sik) Hillary Clinton agreed to a deal to transfer control of 20% of U.S. uranium deposits to a Russian company that was trading for donations to Clinton.
